decisions.decision: Sigmanauts mining pool split off to become more autonomous with its own DAO, giving 5% of active tokens to Sigmanauts treasury
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To allow mining pool to vote on their own things while still giving Sigmanauts a say
decisions.quote: The Sigmanauts mining pool also kind of split off on their own, a little bit more autonomous. They created a DAO and they essentially gave 5% of the active tokens to the Sigmanauts treasury

decisions.decision: Community awards distributed $7,100 total with scaling based on votes received
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: ErgoHack community awards voting completed on Paideia
decisions.quote: This week I paid out $7,100 to the community awards

commitments.commitment: Expanding Web3 libraries for upcoming Palmyra Pro release with traceability modules and oracles
commitments.quote: we just released an update to the Winter Protocol, which is really nice. We're actually expanding our Web3 libraries for the upcoming Palmyra Pro release

commitments.commitment: Heading to Argentina to attend and sponsor ADN conference in Buenos Aires
commitments.quote: I'm going to be heading out to Bolivia. What the hell am I talking about? Sorry... Argentina. Heading over there... We're also going to be attending and sponsoring the ADN conference in Argentina in Buenos Aires

commitments.commitment: Migrating Sigmanauts mining pool to cheaper server to cut costs from $100/month to $40-45/month
commitments.quote: Mark also is working on, we're working on migrating the Sigmanauts mining pool to a cheaper server... hopefully this week we'll spin that up and do some tests on it

commitments.commitment: Fire up separate mining pool to test storage rent collection for kushti
commitments.quote: After that, kushti has asked me to fire up a separate mining pool so that he can test, what's it called, storage rent collection? So that's exciting. So I have to do that this week

commitments.commitment: Will ask mgPai about updating ErgPy
commitments.quote: All right, all right. I'll ask him. I'll ask him

open_questions.question: Who are the current members of the EF? Are Joe and MHS off?
open_questions.context: Community question about Ergo Foundation membership status

open_questions.question: When will Gluon Gold mainnet launch?
open_questions.context: Community question about Gluon Gold timeline

Amount and timeline for Rosen rewards distribution from ErgoHack

key_facts.fact: Rosen Runes got approved for Catalyst funding
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: About 400-500 ERGs currently ready to be collected by miners through storage rent collection

key_facts.fact: Total community awards for ErgoHack were $7,100, funded largely by MX's 6-7k ERG donation
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 1,000 ERGs remaining from community rewards to be distributed as 100 ERGs to each of 10 ErgoHack teams
